function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"People required to stay at home leading to higher home energy usage","Impact":"Increased energy costs and environmental impact","Mitigation":"Promote energy-saving practices, invest in energy-efficient technology","Technologies":"Smart home devices, energy-efficient appliances, renewable energy sources","People":"Individuals, households, and communities","Owner":"Government, energy companies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Heterogeneous restrictions leading to varied study results","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased research outcomes","Mitigation":"Increase sample size, identify and control for variables related to pandemic restrictions","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, data modeling software","People":"Research teams, statisticians, data analysts","Owner":"Researchers, research institutions, funding agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of longitudinal elements leading to unstable research findings","Impact":"Unreliable and inconsistent study results","Mitigation":"Include replications, build longitudinal elements into research design","Technologies":"Data collection tools, collaborative research platforms","People":"Research teams, collaborators, data collection teams","Owner":"Principal investigators, research teams, research institutions"}]}
